description: In Qualcomm Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, and QRD Android with all Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel before security patch level 2018-04-05, a Use After Free condition can occur in the function rmnet_usb_ctrl_init().

product.name: Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, QRD Android

enisaIdProduct.product_version: All Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel
